item.title: Escape room: Translating between RSEs and Arts & Humanities Researchers
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Cave-Brown-Cave-1916 - HP5-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer This document should be used to capture the information for a Hack Day Idea. Idea name (provisional) Escape room: Translating between RSEs and Arts & Humanities Researchers (Part 1) This is the provisional name of the Idea, solution or just a title; this can be changed later if a team is formed and you decide on a new team/product name.
